name: Laser Tag (Demo)
description:
Play laser tag, but on your device! Play with friends using online multiplayer or local multiplayer!

You must get points by tagging enemies. Play different modes and ways!

Earn or buy Laser Chips to buy cool cosmetics in the shop!

Just sign up and login, or go straight in with offline mode!

Download, install and play now for free!

(Note: The full game will release 21 November 2022)
